entry.title: First post
entry.content:
My first try of jekyll static site builder. Looks like it works. You only need to install ruby, gems, and run it. Now lets try to connect it to Github Pages

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyllâ€™s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: My first try of jekyll static site builder. Looks like it works. You only need to install ruby, gems, and run it. Now lets try to connect it to Github Pages
